text: John James Harker (10 October 1876 – 1962) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1876 births Category:1962 deaths Category:People from County Durham (district) Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Harker (footballer)
